text: Draft at the Engine Room. Pours golden with a white head that disappears quickly. Leaves no lacing in the glass. Huge, huge oak on the nose which gives the effect of some rather stinky cheese but stinky in a good way. Nice grass and floral notes on the tongue along with the wood ones. The wood does linger a bit. Its different but in a good way.
Intense sour notes, cellar, woody, light fruity notes, golden with no head, light body, practically flat, taste is similar, quite sour...good afterall.
Draft. Smells like steins garden and gifts. Flavor isna sour version of stein gardens and gifts. Haha. Good but fucked up.
Threes, Brooklyn tap: pours golden with no head. Aroma is thyme, basement, funk. Taste is lightly, sour, smoked. Weird. Not flavors you normally see.
Light cider with funk aroma. Slight hazy color with no head. Light super dry mouthfeel with an almost pear background. Light and delicious.
Vegetative tart fishbowl water cider aroma. Clear pee yellow still no head. Mellow tartness vinegar zip but dried out by the herb thyme. Thin and cider like texture.
From tap at Il Locale. Hazy golden colour with a white head. Aroma and flavour of yeast, spice, hops, fruit, sourness and acidic.
From tap. Pours hazy orange with a small white head. Aroma is solid herbal, acetone and dry fruity. Sourish, fruity and dry acetone. Herbal and sour dry finish.

Draft. A hazy yellow beer with a white head. The aroma has notes of funk, wood, brettanomyces, and malt. The flavor is sour with notes of brettanomyces, horseblanket, funk, malt, and spices, leading to a tart finish.

Pours a hazy yellow golden color with a trace of bubbles rising to the top. Nose is oak forward with soft vanilla, wet old barrel, lemon peel and basement funk. Palate follows with a focused acid profile, heightened by lemon notes and subtle stonefruit. Lingering funk and an old austere barrel profile make this one a winner in my book !

Aroma and taste is citrus fruity with nice lemon hit, citric spice, light floral and herbal hoppy character, light tart citrus fruity finish. Lovely gear.

5

Light bodied with light carbonation.

Good grief. I go to the bathroom and the other stuff I posted disappears.

In a nutshell, looks average, has a fruity vinegar tartness smell with a hint of Brett.

Tastes of green apples , vinegar, mild funk, bit of hop bitterness, overall very dry.

375 ml bottle Zip, ÷$12 a capped and corked bottle. Worthy of a repurchase.

Bottle thanks to Alberto. Pours a clear yellow color with almost no head. A big white wine fruity nose. Sourness, lemons, funky white wine, tart vinous notes. This is really not a golden ale in any sense. Tastes like a sour farmhouse ale. Rustic malty base. Quite nice.

On tap @Stavio (Rome). Pours golden with a white persistent foam. Aroma is floral with citric notes, grass, lime, spices, oak. Flavour is light sour, citric notes, oak, lime, tart in the end. Medium body, medium to light carbonation. Original and very well brewed!
UPDATED: JUN 29, 2015 A: oak, elderflower, lemon, lime T: Elderflower, lime, oak O: Nice, not an outstanding sour but quite good.
Keg in Lambiczoon, Milan. Bright golden colour, thick white head. Citrusy flavours with a restrained but definite sour tartness. Very refreshing.
On tap @ Nidaba in Montebelluna and @ Lambizoon in Milan. Great discovery! Bravi. Beautiful appearance, blonde, carbonate and foam. Delicate and sour at the same time. Oh I wish I met you before!!!
Bottle. Pours a hazy yellow color with a small white head. Has a fruity sour citrus hoppy aroma. Fruity sour citrus flavor. Has a fruity sour citrus finish.
Golden beer with really thin foam and no gas. Lemon and citrix at the nose with mold notes its aroma. Young wood and and lemon in mouth with really nice sour taste in the end.
Birra dai colori brillanti e paglierini. Schiuma grana fine frizzante al palato. Acido non agressivo. Profumo di agrumi. Pulisce il palato. Ottima davvero e unica nel suo genere

@ SBWF 2014: en ganska distinkt kryddig doft. Smaken är tydlig åt citrushållet. Helt ok. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottled at SBWF.  HAzy golden, minimal head. Tart vinous nose. Grasssy and minerally with oaked white wine . Dry and light with significant tartness. Refreshing and subtly complex. Excellent!
Sample at SBWF 2014. Clear yellow beer with a small white head. Peppery citrus aroma with some sour notes to it. Sour flavor with grapefruit, hay and some citrus.
Sample at SBWF 2014. Clear pale yellow beer, small head. Sourish spicy aroma, caramel, rubler notes. Sourish rubber flavor, hay, grapefruit, vinegar notes.
Sample at SBWF 2014. Hazy golden with a small white head. Light and refreshing with citrus, some hay, bread and light malt. An ok one.
chiara leggrmente velata buona schiuma piuttosto persistente naso citrico legno erba leggera spezua buona nota acida secca amaro medio scorza limone

Draft @ Lambiczoon, Milano, thanks Nino.
Dorée, col fin blanc.
Arôme offre un excellent bouquet de oût de vin blanc avec un bouquet subtil et herbacé de thym. Le tout faisant pener à un léger houblonnage à cru.
Palais est léger, pointe surette avec un petit rappel vin blanc et ici aussi, ce côté moût. Pointe herbacée rappelant la bergamote - thym. Citronné avec une pointe thé vert et citronnelle + raisin blanc léger. Léger et surprenant. Une belle remontée que les déceptions que furent les deux Kolsch.
